in path
required True
schema
type string
name siteid

in path
required True
schema

summary Get raw log access list
description blockcallout

  type danger

Retrieve a list of IPs or CIDRs with access to WAF raw logs
responses
200
wafGetRawLogAccessListResponse
type object

type object
properties

format datetime

description The requested information about IPs or CIDRs that have access to WAF site raw logs
description A response from a request to retrieve a list of IPs or CIDRs with access to WAF raw logs
